ConnectionIPAddress.description: IP Address of Service Entry point to be used

SshTunnel.description: Indicates if the user wants to communicate through SSH tunnel

SSHPortList.description: List of ports to connect to via ssh tunnelling

Protocol.description: User can now give https or http

AuthenticationRequired.description: Indicates if REST API authentication is required by the Redfish service

PowerOffCommand.description: Command to use to turn off the system

PowerOnCommand.description: Command to use to turn on the system

AMCIPAddress.description: IP Address of AMC (i.e. HMC) to be used

PowerOffWaitTime.description: Off delay needed (in seconds) during FW Activation

PowerOnWaitTime.description: Wait time (in seconds) during FW Activation post reset cycle

FwStagingTimeMax.description: Maximum time in seconds taken by staging (copy) phase of full device FW update

FwActivationTimeMax.description: Maximum time in seconds taken by activation phase of full device FW update

IdleWaitTimeAfterFirmwareUpdate.description: Wait time (in seconds) for runtime execution delay
